name: Firefall - "Racer" Premium Pack
detailed_description:
Ride in style with the brand new Racer Premium Pack! This pack includes:

The Bumblebee MGV

• Cruise around in this stylish all-terrain vehicle along with a gun-toting passenger!
• Disclaimer: Contrary to popular belief, it does not transform into a giant robot.

25 Security Keys

• Use the key to open various security caches in the game for ultimate rewards.
• May the epic and legendary quality be with you!

30 Days of VIP

• +25% Earned Crystite
• +25% Earned XP
• +25% Earned Reputation Vouchers
• +2 Crafting Workbench Slots
• +8 Market Slots
• Access to the VIP Boosted Glider Pad

100 Red Beans

• Currency used to purchase additional in-game items and perks.
• “I’d buy THAT for 100 Red Beans!” – Random Bandit

Exclusive Title “Racer”

• Exclusive in-game title for this digital package.
• Let the world know that you’re not just furious.

short_description: Cruise the treacherous terrains of New Eden with the Racer Premium Pack! This bundle includes The Bumblebee MGV, 25 Security Keys, 30 Days of VIP, 100 Red Beans, and an Exclusive Title, “Racer.”
supported_languages:
English*, German, French
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Windows XP SP3
  • Processor:AMD Dual Core @ 2.6GHz; Intel Dual Core @ 2.2GHz
  • Memory:4 GB RAM
  • Graphics:Nvidia 8600 or ATI 4xxx with 1GB of VRAM
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
